messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
I am one of the Ninja Trio!
Being discovered means I must battle!But how did you discover me?
Don’t tell me you’re a ninja, too!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
A Pokémon Trainer’s good at finding
stuff, I guess.
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
You should join us so we can form
the Ninja Quartet!Anyway, let’s battle!
